import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-shop-owner', templateUrl: './ShopOwner.component.html', styleUrls: ['./ShopOwner.component.css'] }) export class ShopOwnerDetailsComponent { // Ensure these properties are defined shopOwners: any[] = []; // Example: Array of shop owners shopOwnerToUpdate: any = {}; // Example: Object to hold the shop owner to update // Method to delete a shop owner deleteOwner(owner: any): void { // Implement the delete logic here console.log('Deleted:', owner); } // Method to update a shop owner updateOwner(): void { // Implement the update logic here console.log('Updating:', this.shopOwnerToUpdate); } // Other necessary methods and properties... }
